name: Ballard Power Systems, Inc.
description: Ballard Power Systems, Inc. is a leading provider of clean energy fuel cell solutions, focused on the development and commercialization of innovative fuel cell technologies. Founded in 1979 and headquartered in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada, Ballard specializes in proton exchange membrane (PEM) fuel cell products that are designed for a range of applications, including transportation, portable power, and stationary power generation. The company's fuel cells are known for their high efficiency and zero-emission operation, making them an attractive alternative to traditional fossil fuel-based power systems. Ballard serves a diverse set of markets, including buses, commercial vehicles, and backup power systems, and is committed to advancing the hydrogen economy through strategic partnerships and collaborations with industry leaders. The company aims to accelerate the adoption of clean fuel cell technology as a viable solution for sustainable energy needs, contributing to global efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change. With a strong focus on research and development, Ballard continues to innovate in the fuel cell space, enhancing performance, durability, and cost-effectiveness to meet the growing demand for clean energy solutions.
